named-native-query.name: EmprestimoLivro.buscar
named-native-query.query: select * from public.emprestimo_livro eml where (cast(?1 as varchar) is null or eml.num_emprestimo = to_number(cast(?1 as varchar), '999999999')) and (cast(?2 as varchar) is null or upper(eml.isbn_livro) like upper('%' || cast(?2 as varchar) || '%')) and (cast(?3 as varchar) is null or eml.data_prev_dev = to_date(?3)) and (cast(?4 as varchar) is null or eml.data_dev = to_date(?4)) and (cast(?5 as varchar) is null or eml.valor_multa = to_number(cast(?5 as varchar), '9999999999.99')) order by eml.data_dev
